section.title: SessionInfo
section.p: This is information about a user session created on NCC.

The upstream client starts a user session with NCC by sending a LoginRequest to NCC. If the login succeeds, a LoginResponse with a sessionId will be returned. The upstream client should then include this sessionId for subsequent submit or retrieve requests.

section.title: RequestInfo
section.p: When sending a Submit or Retrieve Request to NCC, the upstream client should include a unique ReqID to identify each request. ReqID is character string type. The request and response messages can be correlated using this ReqID and the ReqID is included in logs, which makes troubleshooting easier.
